name: Fury Gold Mines Limited
longDescription: Fury Gold Mines Ltd is a Canadian-focused exploration and development company strategically positioned in three prolific mining regions: James Bay, Quebec; the Golden Triangle, British Columbia; and the Kitikmeot Region Nunavut. Its projects include Eau Claire, Homestake Ridge, Committee Bay, Eleonore South JV, and Gibson MacQuoid.

fullAddress: 1630-1177 West Hastings Street,Suite 601, Toronto, ON, CA
